description: '''Adekunle Temitope''' (born 27 May 1999), better known by his stage name '''Small Doctor''', is a [[Nigerian]] [[Fuji music|Fuji]], afro-pop recording artist and performer. Small Doctor was preceded by the release of another single: "Penalty" which won award for the "Best Street Hop" at [[The Headies 2018]]. His songs are mostly composed in English, pidgin and [[Yoruba language|Yoruba]].
